articles.content: Shadab Khan and Asif Ali, as well as Shahnawaz Dahani, might be available for only a part of the BBL  •  Getty Images

articles.title: England tour of Pakistan 2022: Pakistan announce venues for England Test series | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz
articles.description: England will be playing a Test series in Pakistan for the first time in 17 years
articles.content:
The last time England toured Pakistan was in November-December 2005. © Getty

articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: 'It was tough watching your friends play...': Samson's hard-hitting revelation - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Samson has proven to be improved version of himself as seen in IPL as well in the last two years, but the inconsistency over his selection has continued and the India star, for the first time, has opened up on the same.
articles.content: All of just 27, Sanju Samson has come a long way in his cricket career. Hailed once as the future superstar of Indian cricket owing to his performances in domestic cricket and IPL, Samson, who made h… [+1832 chars]
